content.title: Intro
content.content:
1921
Preceded by
1921
1922
Year
1923
Followed by
1923

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1922.

content.title: January
content.content: ? - J.R.R. Tolkien writes an entry in his diary on the coming of E.V. Gordon to the University of Leeds.

content.title: February
content.content: 10 - Árpád Göncz, translator and former President of Hungary, is born.

content.title: May
content.content:
11 - J.R.R. Tolkien's A Middle English Vocabulary is published.
27 - Actor Christopher Lee is born.

content.title: July
content.content: 28 - J.R.R. Tolkien agrees to review Beowulf: An Introduction to the Study of the Poem.

content.title: September
content.content: 9 - Tolkien's favourite artist, Pauline Baynes, is born.

content.title: December
content.content: ? - J.R.R. Tolkien's poem The Clerkes Compleinte is published in The Gryphon, Vol.4 No.3.

? - Tolkien begins work on the new edition of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight with E.V. Gordon.
Years
1919 1920 1921 1922 1923 1924 1925
